## Purpose

To analyze the the population of bla bla i have used code that produce interactive graph:

```{r}
library(datasets)
library("pacman")     
p_load(dplyr,tidyr,stringr,ggplot2,rio,lubridate, plotly)
head(iris)

fig <- ggplot(data=iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length, y = Sepal.Width)) +
  geom_point()

ggplotly(fig)
```
